DDL.SQL: CREATE TABLE friends (id INT(32), friend INT(32), PRIMARY KEY (id, friend))
CREATE TABLE users (id INT(32), age INT(32), name VARCHAR(40), address VARCHAR(40), metadata JSON, PRIMARY KEY(id))
CREATE TABLE votes (aid INT(32), uid INT(32), comment_id INT(32), sign INT(32),  PRIMARY KEY (aid, uid))
CREATE TABLE articles (id INT(32), author INT(32), title VARCHAR(40), PRIMARY KEY (id))
CREATE TABLE f2 (friend INT(32), id INT(32), PRIMARY KEY (id))
CREATE TABLE users_no_unique_key (id INT(32), age INT(32), name VARCHAR(40), address VARCHAR(40), metadata JSON)
